${ModID}:ObjectPermanence.NAME: Object Permanence
${ModID}:ObjectPermanence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain !M! dreamermod:Permanence and Exhaust.

${ModID}:DeepConnection.NAME: Deep Connection
${ModID}:DeepConnection.DESCRIPTION: dreamermod:Dreambound reduces dreamermod:Dream cost by 2. NL Add dreamermod:Dreambound to !M! random cards in your hand.

${ModID}:LucidDreamer.NAME: Lucid Dreamer
${ModID}:LucidDreamer.DESCRIPTION: The first time you fully dreamermod:Manifest a card each turn, dreamermod:Dream.
${ModID}:LucidDreamer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you fully dreamermod:Manifest a card each turn, dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:MindBreak.NAME: Mind Break
${ModID}:MindBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:CastOff.NAME: Cast Off
${ModID}:CastOff.DESCRIPTION: Add dreamermod:Dreambound to a card in your hand. NL dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
${ModID}:Reinforce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add dreamermod:Durable to a card in your hand.
${ModID}:Reinforce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add dreamermod:Durable to !M! cards in your hand.

${ModID}:RedInfluence.NAME: Red Influence
${ModID}:RedInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#FF0000]Red[] cards to add to your hand.
${ModID}:RedInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#FF0000]Red[] cards to add to your hand. NL dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:GreenInfluence.NAME: Green Influence
${ModID}:GreenInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#0DFF00]Green[] cards to add to your hand.
${ModID}:GreenInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#0DFF00]Green[] cards to add to your hand. NL dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:BlueInfluence.NAME: Blue Influence
${ModID}:BlueInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#0090FF]Blue[] cards to add to your hand.
${ModID}:BlueInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#0090FF]Blue[] cards to add to your hand. NL dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:PurpleInfluence.NAME: Purple Influence
${ModID}:PurpleInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#AA00FF]Purple[] cards to add to your hand.
${ModID}:PurpleInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random [#AA00FF]Purple[] cards to add to your hand. NL dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:DreamStrength.NAME: Dream Strength
${ModID}:DreamStrength.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you dreamermod:Dream, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

${ModID}:DreamDraw.NAME: Dream Draw
${ModID}:DreamDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you dreamermod:Dream, draw a card.
${ModID}:DreamDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you dreamermod:Dream, draw a card.

${ModID}:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
${ModID}:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal.

${ModID}:ModifierMastery.NAME: Modifier Mastery
${ModID}:ModifierMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with a dreamermod:Modifier, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
${ModID}:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: dreamermod:Manifest X, X times. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Unleash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dreamermod:Manifest X+1, X times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SnapBack.NAME: Snap Back
${ModID}:SnapBack.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Return your dreamermod:Dream card to your hand.
${ModID}:SnapBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Return your dreamermod:Dream card to your hand.

${ModID}:ReinIn.NAME: Rein In
${ModID}:ReinIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce your dreamermod:Dream card's cost by !M!, down to a minimum of 1.

${ModID}:HoldOn.NAME: Hold On
${ModID}:HoldOn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add Retain to a card in your hand.

${ModID}:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
${ModID}:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of your dreamermod:Dream card to your hand. It costs !M! less to play this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Recall.NAME: Recall
${ModID}:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortitude
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add dreamermod:Durable to a random card in your hand.
${ModID}:Fortify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add dreamermod:Durable to a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:ColorBloom.NAME: Color Bloom
${ModID}:ColorBloom.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card for each dreamermod:Modifier on this card.

${ModID}:MindStrike.NAME: Mind Strike
${ModID}:MindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:Envy.NAME: Envy
${ModID}:Envy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has more HP than you, heal !M! HP.

${ModID}:Fester.NAME: Fester
${ModID}:Fester.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy takes !M! damage when targeted by any Fester card.

${ModID}:UltimateWeapon.NAME: Ultimate Weapon
${ModID}:UltimateWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Add dreamermod:Deadly to your current Dream card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RecurringNightmare.NAME: Recurring Terror
${ModID}:RecurringNightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:DreamForge.NAME: Dream Forge
${ModID}:DreamForge.DESCRIPTION: Each card reward after this combat gains a random dreamermod:Modifier. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Siphon.NAME: Siphon
${ModID}:Siphon.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to the number of dreamermod:Modifiers on a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Siphon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to the number of dreamermod:Modifiers on a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Mummify.NAME: Mummify
${ModID}:Mummify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! dreamermod:Permanence.

${ModID}:Backtrack.NAME: Backtrack
${ModID}:Backtrack.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle up to !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ForwardThinking.NAME: Forward Thinking
${ModID}:ForwardThinking.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 card.

${ModID}:OozeBlast.NAME: Ooze Blast
${ModID}:OozeBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! Slimed to your discard pile.

${ModID}:LunarForm.NAME: Lunar Form
${ModID}:LunarForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you draw a card, it becomes Ethereal.
${ModID}:LunarForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you draw a card, it becomes Ethereal.

${ModID}:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
${ModID}:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Grants 1 additional Block for each time you've dreamermod:Dreamed this combat.

${ModID}:CreativeSparks.NAME: Creative Sparks
${ModID}:CreativeSparks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:SleepParalysis.NAME: Sleep Paralysis
${ModID}:SleepParalysis.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! dreamermod:Fatigue to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
${ModID}:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 less damage for each card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:Liminality.NAME: Liminality
${ModID}:Liminality.DESCRIPTION: If this card is dreamermod:Manifested, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
${ModID}:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of a card in your hand by !M! times X for the combat.

${ModID}:DreamWeaver.NAME: Dream Weaver
${ModID}:DreamWeaver.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, dreamermod:Manifest !M!.

${ModID}:Inception.NAME: Inception
${ModID}:Inception.DESCRIPTION: Permanently replace this card in your deck with a copy of your dreamermod:Dream card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
${ModID}:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies with a debuff.

${ModID}:Brace.NAME: Brace
${ModID}:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Double all Block gained this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Brace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double all Block gained this turn.

${ModID}:ClearMind.NAME: Clear Mind
${ModID}:ClearMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your dreamermod:Dream slot is empty, gain !M! additional Block.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Add a Slimed to your discard pile.

${ModID}:GrowingTerror.NAME: Growing Terror
${ModID}:GrowingTerror.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! whenever it enters your hand.

${ModID}:DreamShield.NAME: Dream Shield
${ModID}:DreamShield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you dreamermod:Manifest a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:NightmareFuel.NAME: Nightmare Fuel
${ModID}:NightmareFuel.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Max HP of ALL enemies by !M!%. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deals additional equal to the number of cards played this combat.

${ModID}:DozeOff.NAME: Doze Off
${ModID}:DozeOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, dreamermod:Dream.

${ModID}:GrowingNightmare.NAME: Growing Nightmare
${ModID}:GrowingNightmare.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and double this damage

${ModID}:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
${ModID}:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.
${ModID}:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Fling.NAME: Fling
${ModID}:Fling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw a card.

${ModID}:Subdue.NAME: Subdue
${ModID}:Subdue.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL enemies' Strength by !M! this turn. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${ModID}:Enlighten.NAME: Enlighten
${ModID}:Enlighten.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:Escalation.NAME: Escalation
${ModID}:Escalation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E] .
